heading: 2010 ACF Fall |2010 | Bellarmine and UCLA (1) | 3 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: 3. Name some things in math that can involve matrices, for 10 points each: [10] [10] Single-row or single-column matrices can represent these n-tuples of numbers; in two or three-dimensional space, they are shown as arrows drawn from the origin to a specific coordinate. They can be multiplied through both inner and outer products.
